movies.title: De Picos Pardos a la ciudad

biography.bio: José Luis Carbonell is an actor and writer, known for De Picos Pardos a la ciudad (1969), ¡Ahí va otro recluta! (1960) and La viudita ye-yé (1968).
biography.name: José Luis Carbonell

biography.placeOfBirth: Murcia, Murcia, Región de Murcia, Spain
biography.bio: Elena María Tejeiro was born on October 25, 1939 in Murcia, Murcia, Región de Murcia, Spain as María Elena Mellado del Hoyo. She is an actress, known for Des espagnoles à Paris (1971), The Art of Living (1965) and Las salvajes en Puente San Gil (1966).
biography.name: Elena María Tejeiro

biography.bio: Ángel de Andrés was born on May 25, 1918 in Madrid, Spain as Angel de Andrés Miquel. He was an actor and writer, known for Esquilache (1989), Historias de la radio (1955) and El hincha (1958). He was married to Conchita Juárez. He died on August 5, 2006 in Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Ángel de Andrés

biography.bio: José Marco Davó was born on May 10, 1895 in Orihuela, Alicante, Spain. He was an actor, known for Marcelin, pain et vin (1955), I Was a Parish Priest (1953) and Le muchacho (1956). He died on September 27, 1974 in Torrevieja, Alicante.
biography.name: José Marco Davó

biography.bio: Mary Santpere was born on September 1, 1913 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Mary Santpere Hernández. She was an actress, known for Mare i fill, societat limitada (1980), Miss Cuplé (1959) and Detective con faldas (1962). She was married to Francisco Pigrau. She died on September 23, 1992 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Mary Santpere

biography.bio: Josefina Güell was born in 1930 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. She is an actress, known for Gaudí (1960), Cristina (1967) and Boystown (2007).
biography.name: Josefina Güell

biography.bio: Luchy Soto was born on February 21, 1919 in Madrid, Spain as Lucía Soto Muñoz. She was an actress, known for The Garden of Delights (1970), Viaje sin destino (1942) and Historias de mi barrio (1964). She was married to Luis Peña. She died on October 5, 1970 in Madrid.
biography.name: Luchy Soto

biography.bio: Perla Cristal was born on September 29, 1937 in Buenos Aires, Argentina as Perla Cristal Lijtik. She is an actress, known for Love in Difficult Times (2005), La furia del Hombre Lobo (1972) and The Awful Dr. Orlof (1962).
biography.name: Perla Cristal

biography.placeOfBirth: Boma, Belgian Congo [now Democratic Republic of the Congo]
biography.bio: Claudia Gravy was born on May 12, 1945 in Boma, Belgian Congo as Marie-Claude Perin. She is an actress, known for Libertarias (1996), Barcelona Connection (1988) and Les démons sexuels (1972).
biography.name: Claudia Gravy

biography.bio: Magda Meyer is an actress, known for De Picos Pardos a la ciudad (1969) and Am laufenden Band (1974).
biography.name: Magda Meyer

biography.bio: Adrián Ortega was born in 1909 in Havana, Cuba. He was an actor, known for La tía de Carlos en mini-falda (1967), Red Cross Girls (1958) and Historias de la radio (1955). He died on April 2, 1996 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Adrián Ortega

biography.bio: Lluís Nonell was an actor, known for La 'mini' tía (1968), Brillante porvenir (1965) and Chico, chica, ¡boom! (1969). He died on January 30, 1982 in València, València, Comunitat Valenciana, Spain.
biography.name: Lluís Nonell

biography.bio: Juan Velilla was born on March 30, 1927 in Reus, Tarragona, Catalonia, Spain as Joan Velilla i Alcaraz. He was an actor, known for Night of the Howling Beast (1975), Exorcismo (1975) and La 'mini' tía (1968). He died in May 1995 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia.
biography.name: Juan Velilla

biography.bio: Manuel Gas was born in 1905 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Manuel Gas Cabré. He was an actor, known for Le Judas (1952), Les tueurs de Madrid (1950) and Los agentes del quinto grupo (1955). He died on December 3, 1995 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.
biography.name: Manuel Gas

biography.bio: Asunción Vitoria is known for her work on Salto a la fama (1964), Totò d'Arabia (1965) and El ser (1982).
biography.name: Asunción Vitoria
